message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Your turn Alice.  I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy.
Come on Bob, don't be greedy!
This is getting silly Alice, time is money! Take this deal before inflation eats it away!
You should have taken my previous offers, now I'm taking more
Alice, this is ridiculous.  Let's split it evenly and call it a day.  Any more delays and we'll both be losing out!
